label.intro:
Please share your feedback on the course and download the Certificate of Completion.
Other Next Steps

  • Visit the LINCS Community and join a group! LINCS Community groups that might interest you the most based on this course include Teaching and Learning and Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion.

  • Consider possibilities for observing yourself (through video) or other teachers as one way to continue developing.
  • Plan to review the course self-assessment again in several months to note changes in your practice, needs, and priorities.
  • Visit the Teacher Effectiveness page on LINCS.
